author: Ground News
title: Ground News - ‘Bring them home’: Crowds gather calling for release of Hamas hostages
text:
Summary by Ground News silent vigil took place by Bournemouth Pier Approach on December 28. Organiser Rosalind Schogger said the day’s action was specifically about the Israeli hostages who were taken from peaceful parties or ‘snatched from their beds’ in the night. The crowd sang together and members of the group gave speeches. Share menu More

author: atanaslfc
title: Player-lock not working properly after patch - Answer HQ
text:
Product : EA SPORTS FC 25
Platform : PlayStation 5
Please specify your platform model. Sony PlayStation 5
What is your Gamertag/PSN ID/Switch ID? Atanas_Teddy
Which mode has this happened in? Ultimate Team™
Which part of the mode? Rivals
Can you tell us the date (MM/DD/YYYY) that you saw the bug? 11/20/2024
What time did you see the bug? (HH:MM AM/PM) After the patch
What is your time zone? EET (ART) - GMT + 2:00
How often does the bug occur? Often (50% - 99%)
Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? Just enter a Rivals game and perform the player lock mechanic several times.
What happens when the bug occurs? Sometimes there’s no problem. For example, yesterday I tried it in Squad Battles, and it happened very rarely there. But what happens is that when you perform the player lock and try to quickly switch to the player you want to lock onto, the game doesn’t allow it. The lock activates, but it seems to freeze on the player with the ball, and you can't switch to the player you want. You might only be able to switch after about 4-5 seconds.
What should be happening instead? What should happen is that right after you perform the player lock, you should be able to immediately switch to the player you want. Otherwise, this mechanic becomes pointless.
‌
Team Gullit shows why player lock is broken (Ctrl+ Click it)
I would appreciate it if you could let us know when and if we can expect a fix. It's very annoying.
